CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 4, 1958, p. A10, reads: "YULE SPIRIT - The Decks' Yule spirit prevailed at Loendi Club last week, when the group of young matrons entertained at their annual holiday cocktail party. Known for the exciting gaiety of their parties, this group of good-looking girls provided a gala fete for their friends.  Standing, left to right: Mrs. Norma Malone, Vivian Mason, Mmes. Shirley Porter, Jayne Williams, and Betty Tibbs.  Middle row: Mmes. Betty Jean Williams, Thelma Dunning, Mildred Bass and Anna Mae English.  Top row: Mmes. Ida Mae Grant, Jessie Boyd, Jean Slater, and Ruth Mellix. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of the Decks' club, including front row: Norma Malone, Vivian Mason, Shirley Porter, Jayne Lewis Williams, Betty Tibbs; second row: Betty Jean Williams, Thelma Dunning, Mildred Bass, Anna Mae English; third row: Ida Mae Grant, Jessie Boyd, Jean Slater, and Ruth Mellix, posed in Loendi Club, another version
